txt.en: The first page of the ledger details the eastern fields and the crops being grown there. From the looks of the lists, the carrots would be the most valuable.
The ledger details several items around the homestead and their values.
Carrots can be found in the eastern fields of Cartrev Andras.\n\nThe first page of the ledger indicates the carrots would be worth taking to the auction in Avardin.
